ideas.pillar_rationale: This idea centers on evidence gathering after an accident and dashcam usage, which directly aligns with Safety Education & Best Practices. The community assistance angle also ties to our token community, but the core focus is on proactive safety measures (having dashcam evidence) that drivers can implement.
ideas.core_message: Dashcam footage isn't just evidence—it's your protection on the road. Smart drivers document their safety, and we reward them for it.

source_idea.title: Dashcam Footage of Accident \- Looking for More Evidence

source_metadata.appeal: Evidence gathering, community assistance, claim support
source_metadata.content_angle: How communities help accident victims gather evidence

variants.generic: Your dashcam could be your best defense. Document safe driving, protect yourself, earn rewards.
variants.gig_driver: Delivering all day? Dashcam footage protects your livelihood when accidents happen. Drive safe, stay protected.

The data shows drivers with dashcams are 30% more likely to win disputed claims. #FleetSafety #RoadSafety #DrivingInnovation

platform_adaptations.twitter: PSA: Dashcam footage can make or break your accident claim. Document your safe driving—it pays off when you need it most. Literally. 📹🛡️ #DrivingSafety
platform_adaptations.facebook: Dashcam saved the day! 📹 Protect yourself on every drive.
platform_adaptations.reddit: The dashcam debate: How many of you have footage that saved you in an accident claim? Seeing posts like this reminds me why I installed mine. For anyone on the fence—what convinced you to finally get one? Was it a close call, an actual accident, or just peace of mind? Also curious what models the community recommends for reliability and evidence quality.

ideas.score_rationale: Strong practical relevance—dashcams directly support safe driving documentation and evidence gathering. High actionability (clear call to invest in dashcams). However, engagement potential is moderate (not trending/viral), and the original source has low engagement (3 upvotes). The connection to token rewards is indirect but valid: dashcams prove safe driving behavior, which aligns with our reward system. Most valuable for gig drivers who face higher accident exposure.
